tool_description: Validates recipe ingredients against multiple dietary restrictions and preferences, identifying violations and suggesting modifications.

ingredients.description: List of recipe ingredients to validate

dietary_restrictions.description: List of dietary restrictions to check against

include_traces.description: Whether to flag ingredients that may contain traces of restricted items

error_messages: Unknown dietary restriction: Use recognized restrictions like vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, dairy-free, nut-free, keto, paleo, etc.
Invalid strictness level: Use one of [strict, moderate, lenient].
Empty restrictions list: Provide at least one dietary restriction to validate against.
Ingredient format error: Provide ingredients as simple names without quantities.
usage: Provide ingredient list and dietary restrictions. Set strictness level and whether to check for traces. The tool identifies compliant and violating ingredients with explanations.

is_compliant.description: Whether all ingredients meet the dietary restrictions

compliant_ingredients.description: Ingredients that meet all dietary restrictions

violation_details.description: Explanation of which restrictions are violated and why

modification_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions for making the recipe compliant
